senses: [{"definition":"(with definite article) Something absent, especially absent people collectively; those who were or are not there.","example":null},{"definition":"An absentee; a person who is not there.","example":null},{"definition":"Being away from a place; withdrawn from a place; not present; missing.","example":null},{"definition":"Not existing; lacking.","example":"The part was rudimental or absent."},{"definition":"(sometimes comparable) Inattentive to what is passing; absent-minded; preoccupied.","example":null},{"definition":"In the absence of; without; except.","example":"Absent taxes modern governments cannot function."}]
